title: kArtikEya karuNa
sahitya:
kArtikEya karuNa mUrtiyin kazhalaDi tozhuvOr kali tIrum


anupallavi

  tIrttiDuvAn tannai tOttarippOrin tollai kIrti adarkkOr ellai kiDaiyAdu allavO


caraNam    ettanaiyO bhaktarin Ekkattaip-pOkkavum mettap-parivODavar menmEl Akkamura
nittiyamAna sukham attanaiyum aLikkavum ettanaiyO kunril Erik-kuDi koNDOn
